verses.verse: He cried <WH7121> <WH8799> also in mine ears <WH241> with a loud <WH1419> voice <WH6963>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Cause them that have charge <WH6486> over the city <WH5892> to draw near <WH7126> <WH8804>, even every man <WH376> with his destroying <WH4892> weapon <WH3627> in his hand <WH3027>.

And, behold, six <WH8337> men <WH582> came <WH935> <WH8802> from the way <WH1870> of the higher <WH5945> gate <WH8179>, which lieth <WH6437> <WH8716> toward the north <WH6828>, and every man <WH376> a slaughter <WH4660> weapon <WH3627> in his hand <WH3027>; and one <WH259> man <WH376> among <WH8432> them was clothed <WH3847> <WH8803> with linen <WH906>, with a writer's <WH5608> <WH8802> inkshofar <WH7083> by his side <WH4975>: and they went in <WH935> <WH8799>, and stood <WH5975> <WH8799> beside <WH681> the brasen <WH5178> altar <WH4196>.

And the glory <WH3519> of the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> was gone up <WH5927> <WH8738> from the cherub <WH3742>, whereupon he was, to the threshold <WH4670> of the house <WH1004>. And he called <WH7121> <WH8799> to the man <WH376> clothed <WH3847> <WH8803> with linen <WH906>, which had the writer's <WH5608> <WH8802> inkshofar <WH7083> by his side <WH4975>;

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Go through <WH5674> <WH8798> the midst <WH8432> of the city <WH5892>, through the midst <WH8432> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>, and set <WH8427> <WH8689> a mark <WH8420> upon the foreheads <WH4696> of the men <WH582> that sigh <WH584> <WH8737> and that cry <WH602> <WH8737> for all the abominations <WH8441> that be done <WH6213> <WH8737> in the midst <WH8432> thereof.

And to the others <WH428> he said <WH559> <WH8804> in mine hearing <WH241>, Go <WH5674> <WH8798> ye after <WH310> him through the city <WH5892>, and smite <WH5221> <WH8685>: let not your eye <WH5869> spare <WH2347> <WH8799>, neither have ye pity <WH2550> <WH8799>:

Slay <WH2026> <WH8799> utterly <WH4889> old <WH2205> and young <WH970>, both maids <WH1330>, and little children <WH2945>, and women <WH802>: but come not near <WH5066> <WH8799> any man <WH376> upon whom is the mark <WH8420>; and begin <WH2490> <WH8686> at my sanctuary <WH4720>. Then they began <WH2490> <WH8686> at the ancient <WH2205> men <WH582> which were before <WH6440> the house <WH1004>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Defile <WH2930> <WH8761> the house <WH1004>, and fill <WH4390> <WH8761> the courts <WH2691> with the slain <WH2491>: go ye forth <WH3318> <WH8798>. And they went forth <WH3318> <WH8804>, and slew <WH5221> <WH8689> in the city <WH5892>.

And it came to pass, while they were slaying <WH5221> <WH8687> them, and I was left <WH7604> <WH8737>, that I fell <WH5307> <WH8799> upon my face <WH6440>, and cried <WH2199> <WH8799>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Ah <WH162> YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069> ! wilt thou destroy <WH7843> <WH8688> all the residue <WH7611> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> in thy pouring out <WH8210> <WH8800> of thy fury <WH2534> upon Yerushalayim <WH3389> ?

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> he unto me, The iniquity <WH5771> of the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> and Y'hudah <WH3063> is exceeding <WH3966> <WH3966> great <WH1419>, and the land <WH776> is full <WH4390> <WH8735> of blood <WH1818>, and the city <WH5892> full <WH4390> <WH8804> of perverseness <WH4297>: for they say <WH559> <WH8804>, The YY <WH3068> hath forsaken <WH5800> <WH8804> the earth <WH776>, and the YY <WH3068> seeth <WH7200> <WH8802> not.

And as for me also, mine eye <WH5869> shall not spare <WH2347> <WH8799>, neither will I have pity <WH2550> <WH8799>, but I will recompense <WH5414> <WH8804> their way <WH1870> upon their head <WH7218>.

And, behold, the man <WH376> clothed <WH3847> <WH8803> with linen <WH906>, which had the inkshofar <WH7083> by his side <WH4975>, reported <WH7725> <WH8688> the matter <WH1697>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, I have done <WH6213> <WH8804> as thou hast commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> me.
